divs: Sighting DetailsI don't live in NYC so I'm not sure specifically where I was but I could ask my father the basic area (cant get ahold of him right now). We were driving along the Hudson (the river that seperates NY and NJ) and I saw a metalic shiny saucer. What struck me about it was that it was flying below some of the buildings. I thought maybe it was a helicoptor but just after I saw one and it wasn't nearly as shiny and it was moving faster and was twice as high. I saw the UFO go behind one building and out the other side and after 10 seconds it was gone. We had passed some trees and it had gone away because I was keeping track of its flight pattern.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around January 10th 2008
Summary: Seen across the Hudson from NYC. The UFO was in New Jersey.
